TextView.android:text: For the user to get an accurate job recommendation, the student has to give 2 tests(an Aptitude Test and a Personality Test). The Aptitude Test has 5 subtests, these subtests test the student's Numerical Aptitude, Perceptual Aptitude, Abstract Reasoning, Spatial Aptitude and Verbal Reasoning. The Personality Test, on the other hand, judges the student and their personality, it will be organised into the following 5 categories: Openness, Conscientiousness, Extraversion, Agreeableness, Neuroticism.\n\nAfter both of the tests are given then job recommendation is available. The result of the Aptitude Test and the Personality Test are then fed as input to our Artificial Intelligence algorithm which gives the 3 most suited Job Recommendations taking the Aptitude and Personality of the user into consideration. In case of graduates, the Aptitude Test is replaced by their field specific tests.
